about_the_game:
In celebration of the Mid-Autumn Festival, equip the ship of your choice with the Mosaic permanent camouflage. Unlock the DLC for free, then play 10 battles to claim it. Enjoy, Captain!

This package contains:

  • Mission: Play 10 battles by November 1 to receive 1x Mosaic permanent camouflage.
This limited-time exclusive DLC is only available from September 14 through October 1, 2024, and can only be unlocked with a World of Warships game account that was created through Steam.
